title: Anandam Anandam
sahitya:
(rAgA:  sindhubhairavi)   
  Anandam Anandam enbOm paramAnandamE ulagAnadenrarivOm


caraNam 1    saccidAnanda vaibhOgam inda dhAraNi vAzhvu parAshakti yOgam
accattuyar mana mOham palavAgiya yAvum brahmmattil Ekam
    caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  kharaharapriyA)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G2 R2 S  uLLattil anbinai nATTi ellA uyirgaLum onrenum oTrumai kATTi
veLLattil dONiyap-pOlE kAla vEgattir-selvOm vivEkattinAlE
    caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  jOnpuri)Aa:S R2 M1 P D1 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R2 S  enrum uyirkk-uyirAgi bhuvi engum viLaiyADum Eka rasattai 
onri uNarvadE yOgam anda oTrumaiyAlE samattuvamAgum
    caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  bhImpalAs)Aa:N2 S G2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G2 R2 S  eNNit-tuNivadu yOgam adai Ishanin pUjaiyAi iyaTralum yOgam
uNNalum urangalum yOgam inda uDaluyir vAzkkaiyum kaDavuLin yOgam
